column5: Saw the Bow Narrows on Red Lake has been sold. Does anyone know who the new owners are? Thanks, BD

Check out the Bow Narrows blog. It has all the details. The blog is very well written and has a tremendous amount of interesting facts about Red Lake and the general area's history. I check it every couple of days to see what Dan has written. PjShorthorn.
Congrats to the new owners. I hope their ownership fulfills their dreams of being self employed.
Bow Narrows has not announced the new owners yet. The blog has also not mentioned it and is still being written by Dan. Brenda and Dan will be announcing shortly. -FT

Well, I thought I had read about it on their blog. Maybe someone sent me info. about the sale. In any event, I knew they had sold the camp. http://www.sellingthenorth.com/listings/l0083.html PjShorthorn
While it has changed hands that has been kept on the down low for obvious reasons. No formal announcement has been made, yet.
